replies.body:
Unfortunately, at this rate, prestiges themselves won't be coming back. Kylo does care. He acknowledges that there needs to be a better system than the badges/credits and he is already coming up with stuff. It's easier said then done and even then what little time he has on this project he has to dedicate to Atlas and the pending gameplay update. 

My own personal stance though is that we need prestiges back, we need a system that encourages the players to play.

It's easier said then done and even then what little time he has on this project he has to dedicate to Atlas and the pending gameplay update. 

My own personal stance though is that we need prestiges back, we need a system that encourages the players to play.

replies.body: Keep trails, but remove badges. Level system was better. But start it from the beginning (level 0) for everyone. This will be fair.

replies.body: I don't understand why he wants another new system. The credits/badges aren't a fan favourite and were not that great from the start. They seemed awfully close to the raindrops on OCN (expect Avicus had more crap to buy with them). You can only go so far with credits before they get boring,  whereas levels allow the player to have an ideal goal in mind. I know Kylo does care about this server but what I'm saying is if he wants to keep it from dying completely you need to give the majority of players what they want. I'm not against keeping some sort of ingame currency like credits, but readd levels and prestiges (or some kind of goal for players to compete for).
replies.body_tagged: I don't understand why he wants another new system. The credits/badges aren't a fan favourite and were not that great from the start. They seemed awfully close to the raindrops on OCN (expect Avicus had more crap to buy with them). You can only go so far with credits before they get boring,  whereas levels allow the player to have an ideal goal in mind. I know Kylo does care about this server but what I'm saying is if he wants to keep it from dying completely you need to give the majority of players what they want. I'm not against keeping some sort of ingame currency like credits, but readd levels and prestiges (or some kind of goal for players to compete for).

replies.body:
The only reason I get frustrated was because I've seen so many of these threads about "BRINGING PRESTIGES BACK" and it gets really annoying because all of them get the same answer "We are not bringing back Prestiges."

Although I agree with all most all of what you're saying, it's just not going to happen. :/ The best I can see happening would be the leveling system but you buy each level with credits, and you get credits for each game, not for the whole server. I would love Prestiges back, but it's just not going to happen. :/

replies.body:
Alright here is my actual response.

I don't think Kylo feels` how boring avicus actually is. Like yeah, sure it may be fun with 25v25, whatever. Avicus is shit, there is nothing to work for, the omega badge is just nothing. And it just makes the chat ugly as fuck. Prestiges had a purpose, and they were why avicus sparked. XP was actually fun, credits are just boring, I can't explain that more. You had a bar of XP, and you needed more XP to get another prestige. It was creative, it wasn't fucking OCN, it was why Avicus had players. It wasn't boring as avicus's current state. Credits are just coin after coin, like what the fuck? That is so boring, like holy shit. Most gadgets are useless and have no purpose. 

For the past months, Avicus public is just boring to me, I have the omega badge, I have the heart trail, and it honestly wasn't that hard to get. Like yeah, I was happy when I got it but whats even the point of Avicus anymore? It's not fun. Scrims are fun and thats why I am, like I said before.  

So I understand kylo said "We aren't going back to prestiges, ", well thats his fucking problem. Not mine. If atlas is good, good job but once we get used to it, its just nothing to me, once again.


Just saying...

Just saying...

replies.body: Simple solution for simple problem - geometric progression. Give next prestige for 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048.... lvls. Too many? Then 1, 5, 25, 125, 625, 3125, 15625... Or 1, 5, 10, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000...
replies.body_tagged: Simple solution for simple problem - geometric progression. Give next prestige for 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048.... lvls. Too many? Then 1, 5, 25, 125, 625, 3125, 15625... Or 1, 5, 10, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000...
